plugin.description:
Preview your digital experience accelerator (DXA) pages in the Tridion CME!
This plugin allows you to preview changes to your DXA pages without publishing.
Go to http://www.tridiondeveloper.com/alchemy-plugin-dxa-page-preview to read more about the quick set up process for this plugin.
The plugin requires a small amount of configuration and the set up of a slightly modified DXA web application with access to the Tridion Core Service.
plugin.name: DXA_Page_Preview
